channel.title: Will Some 1 Host A 24/7 Server for me? I have source!
channel.description:
Yea....
I need some 1 that can host my server 24/7. The last guy scamed me and took the source, and trashed the forums $$$ Eh Pretty Easy @@@@
So if you could host a server for me please.
You have to have:
Make It A No-Ip Have An Auto Restarter Be Able To Keep It On 24/7 With No Lagg Comig from You Computer
Thanks
.:: LiAm::.

item.title: Will Some 1 Host A 24/7 Server for me? I have source!
item.dc:creator: @masterp00n masterp00n
item.description:
@masterp00n wrote:

[quote=“pur3 pik3r 9, post:3, topic:59829”]its like impossiable to host it 24/7… when u fall asleep u might leave it on but when it chrases ur not gunna get up to turn it back on… and i hope ur not on the computer 24/7 to run it.[/quote]Well alienware is good to keep it up 24/7

Read full topic

Ill host your server and let you use my domanname. I have Ftp on the server so you can update your files 24/7 . I can put a site on the server too. Respond back if you are interested.
